column2: §MAll players will be notified of this change!§!
[edmp_spn_character.GetTitledFirstName] (Username: [edmp_spn_character.GetHumanName]) has been granted permission to subjugate [edmp_spn_target.GetTitledFirstName]!
[edmp_spn_character.GetTitledFirstName] (Username: [edmp_spn_character.GetHumanName]) has had all subjugation permissions revoked!
[edmp_spn_character.GetTitledFirstName] (Username: [edmp_spn_character.GetHumanName]) has had their permission to subjugate [edmp_spn_target.GetTitledFirstName]!

column1: # Event options (implied player reactions to this news)

column2: Excellent! The world will tremble before me!
Excellent! I am safe from that warmonger!
Curses! That warmonger wishes to conquer my realm!
Curses! I will have to find another way to continue my conquests...
